_aChangeLog.text: Added manually optimized (hand-tuned) and fully place painted .nav-file (Navigation Mesh for playing against the Bots).

_sText:
KUNAR

Hostage Rescue Map for Counter-Strike: Source

CS:GO original map creator: Tanuki
CS:S map port creator: Niko
Navigation Mesh editor: Meurglis3

High-quality port for CS:S of the remarkable samenamed midsize map from CS:GO by Tanuki. This port contains couple of little changes in comparison with the original, which was made for improvement of the gameplay smoothness.

Story: 
   A hostage rescue map on rough terrain. Gameplay is oriented on a single very strong contested area with a smaller side route. This map is great for snipers and those who enjoy outsmarting them.

P.S. ~ Opium and kidnapping brings in eight times as much cash as wheat and uses less water :-)
